197992.「……ルッチー。\n やはり ここにいたのか。\n 送った手紙は 読んだか？:
...Lucchie. So you're here after all. Did you
read the letter I sent you?

197993.「……ちーす。\n 手紙 ありがとよ～。\n 紙ヒコーキにして 楽しく遊んどいた:
...yeah, I got it. Thanks. I folded it into a
paper airplane and had fun playing with
it.

197994.「ペアレンツで そろって来るなんて\n 賢者って 案外 ヒマなんだなあ？:
I'm surprised you both came. I guess sages
aren't as busy as they say, huh?

197995.「ルッチー！\n 私たちは お前のためを思って……。: Lucchie! We're doing this for your own good...

197996.「何度も 言っているだろう。\n 遊び人などという くだらん職業は\n さっさと:
I have told you many times. I have told you
many times to stop being a gadabout.

197997.「いいか…… 遊び人など なんの役にも立たん。\n くさった死体にたかる ハエの:
You see... gadabouts are nothing. They are
like flies on a Walking Corpse. Such a futile
occupation will do you no good!

197998.「……イマドキの遊び人は アンタたちが思ってる\n ダセェ職業じゃねえ。もっと:
Trendy Gadabouts aren't what you think they
are. It's much more interesting. Don't judge
me.

197999.「ルッチー あなたも いい大人でしょう。\n 遊びだなんて ふざけたようなこと言:
Lucchie, you are an adult. Don't be silly
about playing around, and look at the reality.

198000.「これ以上 言っても ムダのようだな。: It seems there's no point in saying any more.

198001.「……だが 今は 楽しかろうとも\n じきに 遊び人の無力さに気づくだろう。\n:
...But whatever fun you're having now, you will soon realize the helplessness of gadabouts. And when that time comes, you will
regret it at best.

198003.「やべぇ～。あの人たちが ウワサの\n ルッチーさんの ペアレンツですかぁ。\n:
Oh my gosh~! Are those the parents of the
rumored Mr. Lucchie? That's really scary...

198004.「……ハイハイ！ そんなことは置いといて！\n これからやる遊びの 内容を発表し:
...Hi-hi! Let's put all that aside! I'll tell
you what we're going to do!

198005.「今回は前から あたためてた とびきりの企画！\n その名も……ハニーパーティー:
This time, I've been planning something I've
been saving up for a long time. It's called...
Honey Party!

198006.「オォーーーッ！ マイ・ハニィーッ！！\n オレの あまいキッスをォ あげるゥー: Oooooh! My honey! I give you my sweet kisses!

198007.「プクランド大陸の エピステーサ丘陵って場所に\n ハニーレイクっていう ハチミ:
In a place called Epistesa Hills in Pukuland
Continent, there is a lake made of honey
called Honey Lake...

198008.「ハニーレイクを 熱で沸かして温泉にすんのさ！\n さらにぃ～ そのハチミツ風呂:
We'll heat Honey Lake and turn it into a hot spring! And what's more, we'll use the honey to make pancakes while bathing in the honey
bath!

198009.「ほよよ～ なんか たのぴよそ～♪\n ハチミツ三昧で あまあまだね～！:
Oh, yes~, what fun~, all that honey, and it's
still so sweet~!

198010.「だがな～ この遊びの準備は あまくねーぞ。\n 湖をあっためる <%sEV_Q:
But, we're not yet ready for a sweet time. We
need Warmaline to keep the lake warm and some
delicious pancakes!

198011.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>なら バザーとかで\n たくさん 売ってるっす:
I'm sure there are lots of Warmaline for sale
at Bazaars and such! Is <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM4> per person enough?

198012.「ケーキといえば～ オルフェアの町に\n おいしいと評判のケーキ屋さんが あった:
Speaking of cakes~ I remember a cake shop in the Town of Orphea that had a reputation for delicious cakes. Their pancakes look delicious
too...

198013.「なるなる～。んじゃ それらを各自で集めてきて\n ３つあるうちの 真ん中のハニ:
I'm sure. I guess we will collect them
ourselves and meet at Honey Lake, the middle
of the three.

198014.「それと 服のままで温泉に入るわけにいかねーし\n 水着着用で シクヨロ！ どの:
And since we can't go to the hot springs in our clothes, we'll be wearing swimsuits, please! You can wear any swimsuit you want,
but you must be able to swim!

198015.「じゃ みんな～ <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM4>個の<%sEV_QUE_NA:
Okay, everyone, bring <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM4> Warmaline and some delicious pancakes to Honey Lake in the middle of the Epistesa Hills and meet me there in
your bathing suits.

198016.「イエーイ <pc>っち！\n 準備 カンペキみたいだなぁ～！\n さっすが～！:
Yay <pc>! You look like you're ready
to go! I'm impressed! You look Squid in your
swimsuit!

198018.<pc>たちは ホカホカストーンを\nハニーレイクに 投げ入れた！:
<pc> threw the Warmalines into Honey
Lake!

198019.ホカホカストーンで 湖があたたまっていく……。\nハニーレイクは ハチミツ温泉に:
Warmaline heats up the lake... and Honey Lake
becomes a honey hot spring!

198020.<pc>たちは パンケーキを持ちよって\nハニーパーティーを始めた！:
<pc> brought pancakes and started a
Honey Party!

198021.「ごくらく ごくらくぅ～！\n いい湯かげんだぜ～。\n 前から やってみたかっ:
Gokuraku, Gokuraku~! I've been wanting to try
this for a long time~! I've always wanted to
try this~ this game~!

198022.「ほよよ～ ホント サイコー♪\n とろけて ハチミツになっちゃいそ～<hear:
Hoyoyo~ It's really the best♪ It's melting
and turning into honey~<heart>

198023.「クゥ～ やっべぇ～！\n アクロバット・パンケーキ うめぇ～っす！\n ハチミ:
Yum! Acrobat pancakes are delicious! The honey
goes perfectly with the pancakes!

198024.「オォーーーッ！ フィーバーッ！！\n オレに 触れると ヤケドするぜィッ！！: Oooooh! Fever! Touch me and you'll get burned!

198025.「ハハッ 何いってんだ パイセン。\n 熱いのはパイセンじゃなくて ハチミツだろ:
What are you talking about, Plug? It's not
Paisen that's hot, it's honey...

198028.「あ～っ！！\n ホカホカストーンが たくさん増えてる～！\n こんなに入れた覚:
Oh, my gosh! There are so many Warmalines! I
don't remember putting this much in...why~?

198030.「誰だ！！\n イタズラしやがったのはっ！？: Who did this! Who did this to you?

198032.「ミヤビっちが言ってた……\n ピエロとバニーの ふたり組……！:
Miyabi said... a clown and a bunny, two
groups...!

198033.「うふっ アツアツのおフロ よかったでしょ～<heart>\n やっぱりぃ～ 遊:
Heh. A hot bath was great wasn't it~<heart>I knew
it~ A gadabout's life should be a fun
experience<heart>

198034.「そや そや！ 言うたれ！\n 近頃のヤングの 遊びときたらなァ！\n ごっつ:
Yes, yes! Tell them! You know what young
people are doing nowadays? It's so lame, it's
boring!

198035.「そないな ツマラン遊びで 喜びよってからに\n 遊び人のカザカミにも 置けへん:
I'm not even a gadabout, Kazakami, if you think I'm going to be pleased by such a silly game! Hey! You gadabouts should stop being
gadabouts!

198036.「あ～？ なんだと てめーら？\n ルッチーさんの考える 遊びはな～\n やっべ:
Oh? What the hell do you think you're doing?
Mr. Lucchie's idea of fun is... it's really,
really fun!

198037.「アヒャヒャ～！ そないな自信あるんやったら\n ワイらが出す 遊び人の試練を受:
Ahhhhh! If you're so confident, take the
gadabout trial we'll give you! If you pass,
you'll be recognized as a true gadabout!

198038.「だ～が 逃げたり 失敗するようなら……\n ワレ 遊び人を名乗るのを やめろや:
But if you keep running away and failing you
can stop calling yourself a gadabout! And get
back to work! Hey!

198039.「遊び人を……やめさせようってのか……？: Are you trying to... stop gadabout...?

198040.「やっぱり アンタたちが 労魔デスワーク……: I knew you guys were Labor Demon Deathwork...

198041.「……オイ ワレ！\n 今日のところは 時間切れや！: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Time's up for today!

198043.「ジブンら！ 遊び人を続けたいなら\n ワイらの試練を おとなしく受けることやな:
Givens! If you want to continue playing
gadabout, you'll have to submit yourselves to
our trials in a docile manner! See you later!

198046.「……果たし状だ。\n 試練の内容が 書いてあるみてーだな。:
It's a letter of fulfillment. It looks like it
describes the trials.

198047.「ええ～？ ルッチーさん\n ガチで アイツらが言ってた試練\n 受けるつもりっ:
What? Are you really going to take the trials
they were talking about, Mr. Lucchie?

198048.「……まあな。\n アイツら 労魔デスワークにちがいねえ。\n バケの皮を はい:
Well, yeah. They must be Labor Demon
Deathwork. We're going to have to skin them.

198049.「いや～ とんだ ジャマ者が入っちまって\n ごめんな～ <pc>っち。\n と:
Sorry for the inconvenience, <pc>.
Let's get you back to the Gadabode for now!

199414.「さっそく ハニーパーティーと\n シャレこみますか！: Let's get to it and have a Honey Party!
